Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_mya231Pddb1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/d2be2b9949b807d8f81eca01696453fd/tumblr_inline_mya248Lzix1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p><strong>tobyb121</strong>'s <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62941-v0-23-Tarsier-Space-Technology"><strong>Tarsier Space Technology</strong></a> gives players enhanced science capabilities through the introduction of two distinct parts. A space telescope that allows for extra long distance viewing (Eeloo can be seen from Kerbin orbit!) and hard drives in which science can be stored without having to constantly save up electricity for data transmission.</p>

<p>All this and more can be found in <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62941-v0-23-Tarsier-Space-Technology"><strong>Tarsier Space Technology</strong></a>.</p>
Great pick! I've been using this mod since yesterday and it's really fun to play with. Endorsed!
Squad is continuing to make these posts through Christmas? Great.

Beautiful little mod. KarmaLlarma approves!

-.- *sigh*
